title: Get Collection Menu
description: Get Collection Menu. Gets the collection data for the Category Navigation Menu. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language.

categoryId.description: ID of the collection to retrieve from the server. Set this to "rootCategory" to retreive the menu category data.

catalogId.description: The ID of the catalogue to retrieve the collection from.

filterKey.description: Set this to "categoryNavData" to retrieve the menu category data

expandChildren.description: Defines whether expanded child category information is required in the response.

maxLevel.description: Defines the number of levels deep of child category to return info on.

includeCollectionsWithNoActiveProducts.description: Indicates whether category information will be returned even if there are no active products in the category.

multipleCategoryPaths.description: Indicates whether to return multiCatalogCategoryPaths and multiCatalogCategoryIdPaths to display linked paths from multiple catalogs prepended with catalog name and id respectively.
